law.catch_line: of trade secret information to assist in responding to emergency spill or discharge.

text.section: Any information disclosed under this section shall not be construed as publicly available by virtue of the disclosure to any entity listed in this section, and release of the information under this section shall not be construed as a waiver of a trade secret claim by the party who has asserted that claim.

law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 9, effective June 24, 2015.
